document.text:
From: Sigrid McCawley cci 
To: ' 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Date: Sun, 07 Jul 2019 02:44:18 +0000 
Great work —  thanks! 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES 
SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
www.bsfllp.com
From: ) 
Sent: Saturday, July 06, 2019 10:40 PM 
To: Sigrid McCawley 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Sigrid, 
Thanks very much for being in touch, and for the kind words —  this hit the news much faster than we anticipated, so 
unfortunately we weren't able to directly reach all the folks we wanted to before the reports came out, but we truly and 
greatly appreciate your help and the help of your clients throughout our investigation. And we expect that the 
investigation will expand significantly in the coming weeks, so I'm sure we'll be in touch. 
thanks again, 
From: Sigrid McCawley 
Sent: Saturday, July 06, 2019 22:30 
To: 
Subject: Epstein 
< 
> 
Thank you for having the courage to see justice. I spoke to moments ago and she was in tears hearing that 
Epstein has finally been arrested for his years of criminal abuse. 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES 
SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
www.bsfIlp.com
EFTA00030241
